Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Category: COSMETIC AND MEDICAL EQUIPMENT AND IMPLEMENTS
Name: Vase for cosmetics
Description: Vase for cosmetics which has a flat wide lip at the rim, the external surface of which has a S-profile, also a deep groove at the transition between neck and shoulder and a deep body with thick walls and a marked shoulder. The flat base does not protrude.
